title: Feed operations: refresh, monitor, error handling
content:
Feed operations: refresh, monitor, error handling

Set the cadence and error-handling routine for your feed.

Learning goal

  • Schedule feed refresh.
  • Set up error list and logging.

Why it matters

  • Stale feed → wrong recommendations.
  • Ignoring errors can lead to exclusion.

Explanation

  • Refresh: daily/hourly based on stock/price changes.
  • Monitor: error codes, missing fields, disapprovals.
  • Log: date, error type, fix, SLA.

Examples

  • Good: weekly error report, SLA to fix.
  • Poor: “We’ll check later”.

Guided exercise (10–15 min)

  1. Set refresh frequency (e.g., daily) and note it.
  2. Create an error log template: Date | Error | Product | Fix | SLA.

Independent exercise (5–10 min)

Log 3 sample errors.

Self-check

  • Refresh cadence set.
  • Error log template ready.
  • 3 errors recorded.

Optional deepening

  • GMC error guide: https://support.google.com/merchants/answer/7052112
